body_html:
Seems like CUDA support is broken again with the latest MSVC, since they have incremented the version string to 1912, and nvcc expect at most 1911.

There are already bug reports for nvidia. #1 #2
body_text:
Seems like CUDA support is broken again with the latest MSVC, since they have incremented the version string to 1912, and nvcc expect at most 1911.
There are already bug reports for nvidia. #1 #2
body:
Seems like CUDA support is broken again with the latest MSVC, since they have incremented the version string to 1912, and nvcc expect at most 1911.

There are already bug reports for nvidia. [#1](https://devtalk.nvidia.com/default/topic/1027362/estimated-date-for-support-of-msvc-1912-/) [#2](https://devtalk.nvidia.com/default/topic/1027299/cuda-9-failed-to-support-the-latest-visual-studio-2017-version-15-5/)
